story: As a User, I want to upload and resize images so that they fit the layout requirements.
As a User, I want to create an account, verify my email, and set up my profile so that I can use the platform.
As a User, I want to upload an image so that I can share it with others.
As a Manager, I want to generate reports and send them to stakeholders so that they stay informed.
As a Customer, I want to view product details so that I can make an informed purchase decision.
As a User, I'm able to click a particular location from the map and thereby perform a search of landmarks associated with that latitude longitude combination.
